statements: DELETE FROM player_statistics WHERE loss_count > 10 AND kill_count < 5
DELETE FROM match_results WHERE match_id = 100 AND player_id = 3;
DELETE FROM match_results WHERE win = TRUE AND match_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM match_history WHERE match_date < '2022-01-01' AND match_result = 'draw';
DELETE FROM match_history WHERE player_id = 2002 AND match_result = 'Win';
DELETE FROM kills WHERE player_id = 'c4b6de79-7b69-4187-b2d8-309cbb2cbf7a' AND kill_timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM players WHERE win_count > 50 AND loss_count < 20;
